thread.title: adidas’s Ultra Boost Uncaged Appears on Instagram in Black Colorway
thread.title_full: adidas’s Ultra Boost Uncaged Appears on Instagram in Black Colorway

author: Aleks Eror
title: adidas’s Ultra Boost Uncaged Appears on Instagram in Black Colorway

organizations.name: ultra boost uncaged appears on instagram

text:
A shot of the adidas Ultra Boost Uncaged in triple black has appeared on Instagram, where you can now look at it.
Posted by @sneakerprophet_ , a regular source of sneaker shots, it looks like recent Uncaged adidas Ultra Boosts only with a black midsole. The uppers are a blend of black and grey fabric.
There’s little else to say about the shot, as all it was accompanied by was a couple of handfuls of hashtags, but an observant commenter posting from the handle @1dopebloke seems to suggest that the upper is crafted from marled wool, writing: “Fire. I just got the Triple Black Uncaged and damn, id [ sic ] still scoop these. Marled wool. Wow!”
Keep it locked on @sneakerprophet_’s Instagram as there will no doubt be more images soon.
Check out this adidas Ultra Boost Uncaged with multicolor speckles .
